result.eng: What is your date of birth?
result.html: Cad é do dháta breitheWhat is your date of birth?
result.ponchtml: Cad é do ḋáta breiṫeWhat is your date of birth?

result.eng: She is from Connemara by birth.
result.ga: Is as Conamara ó dhúchas í
result.orig: Is as Conamara ó dhúchas í
result.html: Is as Conamara ó dhúchas íShe is from Connemara by birth.
result.ponchtml: Is as Conamara ó ḋúċas íShe is from Connemara by birth.

result.eng: The cow gave birth in the evening.
result.html: Bheir an bhó tráthnónaThe cow gave birth in the evening.
result.ponchtml: Ḃeir an ḃó tráṫnónaThe cow gave birth in the evening.
